channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nothing Beats Our Editors' Favorite Office Chair, and It’s on Sale Now
item.description: Looking for a new office chair? Branch is offering 10 percent off the base price of its chairs and accessories.

item.title: Google launches the Pixel 10 series, base model now has three-cameras
item.description: Google is improving the base Pixel offering by introducing a three rear camera system to the Pixel 10.

item.title: Phone Searches at the US Border Hit a Record High
item.description: Customs and Border Protection agents searched nearly 15,000 devices from April through June of this year, a nearly 17 percent spike over the previous ...

item.title: Sony is increasing the price of the PlayStation 5 as new tariffs take hold
item.description: Sony is hiking the price of PlayStation 5 consoles in the U.S. this week, citing a "challenging economic environment."

item.title: The PlayStation 5 Is About to Get More Expensive
item.description: Starting August 21 in the US, every edition will cost $50 more than it did the day before, thanks to Trump’s tariffs.

item.title: Pixel 10, new Gemini features, the Pixel Watch, and everything else announced at the Made by Google 2025 event
item.description: Dive into what we can expect from the Made by Google 2025 event, where the tech giant will debut its Pixel 10 lineup.

item.title: The Fitbit App Is Turning Into an AI-Powered Personal Health Coach
item.description: Built with Gemini, Google’s AI health coach will be everything but a doctor.

item.title: Do Large Language Models Dream of AI Agents?
item.description: For AI models, knowing what to remember might be as important as knowing what to forget. Welcome to the era of “sleeptime compute.”

item.title: Google doubles down on ‘AI phones’ with its Pixel 10 series
item.description: Google's updates to the Pixel 10 line allow it to showcase what its latest AI technology can do when enhanced by the Tensor G5 processor, an upgrade t...

item.title: Anthropic bundles Claude Code into enterprise plans
item.description: The integration positions Anthropic to better compete with command-line tools from Google and GitHub, both of which included enterprise integrations o...
